Package com.company

Class Playground

java.lang.Object
com.company.Playground
public class Playground
extends java.lang.Object
A Playground object contains information and methods to be applied to playgrounds and relate them to their owners. A Playground has a name, description, timeSlots, bookingNumber, pricePerHour and ownerUsername

    • Playground

      public Playground​(java.lang.String nm, java.lang.String desc, int bn, double prh, java.lang.String username)
      A Constructor that sets the Playground data
      Parameters:
      nm - name of the playground
      desc - description of the playground
      bn - a unique booking number for the playground
      prh - price per hour of the playground
      username - username of the owner of the playground
